IntroText.text: Hello there, are you okay? You seemed to have crashed your plane.
You have landed on our secluded mountain! You seem to be the only survivor...
How do I get out of here?
Well, the only way off is by defeating Nogard the Dragon, who guards the only exit.
The exit lies deep within a maze of caves... where Nogard resides.
Well... how do you suppose I defeat him??
You must fight your way through the caves and face him head-on.
Collect gold to purchase equipment from the shop to help you along the way!
Good luck! If you have any questions, I'll be nearby!

HenryText.text1: Hello there! How can I help you?
